title: The Remake of ‘The Mummy’ Takes Its Title Literally, Considers Casting a Female Lead
text:
The Remake of ‘The Mummy’ Takes Its Title Literally, Considers Casting a Female Lead 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
Universal’s remake of The Mummy is set for a 2017 release date and is intended to help kick off an entire new cinematic universe starring ...
